Package index

All functions

aggregate_cube()
Aggregate datacube over grid cell to create new dataframe with species list per grid
append_ott_id()
Append ott id's to cube
calculate_faithpd()
Calculation of Faith's PD
check_completeness()
Check if provided phylogenetic tree is complete and covers all species in occurrence cube
convert_multipolygons()
Convert multisurface object to multipolygon object
generate_map_and_indicator()
Mapping PD and calculating indicator
get_pd_cube()
Find MRCA for data cube and call function to calculate PD metrics
make_shiny_maps()
Visualizing PD maps for time periods in tabs
retrieve_example_data()
Retrieve example data
taxonmatch()
Taxon matching
